alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Harrison; Orange; Perry; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Harrison, southeastern Dubois, Crawford, northeastern Perry, southern Orange and southwestern Washington Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of English to 12 miles southwest of Carefree Town. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... English and Carefree Town around 425 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Corydon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Dubois; Harrison; Orange; Perry; Washington
